panels.description: Morning and evening routine timing over the past 30 days
panels.title: Routine Timeline: Wake & Sleep

panels.description: Weekday vs weekend occupancy comparison across all rooms

targets.query:
import "date"

// Weekday occupancy
weekday = from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "binary_sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] =~ /presence/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => date.weekDay(t: r._time) >= 1 and date.weekDay(t: r._time) <= 5)
  |> stateDuration(fn: (r) => r._value == "on", unit: 1h)
  |> group(columns: ["entity_id"])
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "Weekday"}))
  |> yield(name: "weekday")

import "date"

// Weekend occupancy
weekend = from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "binary_sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] =~ /presence/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => date.weekDay(t: r._time) == 0 or date.weekDay(t: r._time) == 6)
  |> stateDuration(fn: (r) => r._value == "on", unit: 1h)
  |> group(columns: ["entity_id"])
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "Weekend"}))
  |> yield(name: "weekend")

panels.title: Weekday vs Weekend Comparison

panels.description: Room occupancy patterns throughout the day

targets.query:
// Hourly occupancy rate (% time occupied per hour)
from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "binary_sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] =~ /presence/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if r._value == "on" then 1.0 else 0.0}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["entity_id"])
  |> yield(name: "occupancy_rate")

panels.title: Peak Activity Hours (Heatmap)

targets.query:
// Room transition timeline
from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "binary_sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] =~ /presence/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "entity_id"])
  |> yield(name: "transitions")

panels.description: Detected deviations from normal occupancy patterns

targets.query:
import "date"
import "math"

// Expected pattern: historical average for hour-of-day
expected = from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: -30d, stop: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "binary_sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] =~ /presence/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      hour: date.hour(t: r._time),
      occupied: if r._value == "on" then 1.0 else 0.0
  }))
  |> group(columns: ["entity_id", "hour"])
  |> mean(column: "occupied")
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "expected")

// Actual today's occupancy
actual = from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "binary_sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] =~ /presence/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      hour: date.hour(t: r._time),
      occupied: if r._value == "on" then 1.0 else 0.0
  }))
  |> group(columns: ["entity_id", "hour"])
  |> mean(column: "occupied")
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "actual")

// Compare and detect anomalies
join(
    tables: {expected: expected, actual: actual},
    on: ["entity_id", "hour"]
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      entity_id: r.entity_id,
      hour: r.hour,
      expected: r.occupied_expected,
      actual: r.occupied_actual,
      deviation: math.abs(x: r.occupied_actual - r.occupied_expected)
  }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.deviation > 0.3)
  |> keep(columns: ["entity_id", "hour", "expected", "actual", "deviation"])
  |> sort(columns: ["deviation"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 20)
  |> yield(name: "anomalies")

panels.title: Pattern Anomalies (>30% Deviation)
